title: File Unpacker Output
description: Output of the File Unpacker Actor containing extracted file information

fileUrl.title: Source File URL
fileUrl.description: The URL of the archive file that was downloaded and extracted

outputPath.title: Output Directory
outputPath.description: The directory where the files were extracted

maxFileSizeMb.title: Max File Size (MB)
maxFileSizeMb.description: Maximum allowed file size in megabytes
